title: The roof loading adopted in the design of such building should be at least 50 kg
clause_text: The roof loading adopted in the design of such building should be at least 50 kg. Per sq.m. for the installation of SWH / RTPV. At least 25% of the roof area shall be utilized for installation of the SWH / RTPV system.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The roof loading adopted in the design of such building should be at least 50 kg. Per sq.m. for the installation of SWH / RTPV.
